casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Toney CAUDLE. No. 433P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 16, 2005. Kevin Patrick Bradley, Durham, for Toney Caudle. William Graham, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of August 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of August 2005."
